name: The Rage of Ikthillion
description:
TAB for Inventory, WASD to move, LEFT CLICK to use weapons.

Only you can save the innocent inhabitants of Pickaxe Town from The Rage of Ikthillion. Dig him out using your heroic senses, and save all Ikthia.

NOTE: Once the game is started, the world state is permanent. If you have issues with the generation or being spawn camped just restart the game. Good luck!

Made in Bevy for

Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023!

This is my first game and first jam, and it was a blast!

Thank you to the many artists whose open source works I used!
